title: Batch Aggregation Fix Validation Test
theme: Mixed Photography Styles - Testing pipeline with varied compositions
pastWinners: Test winners demonstrate consistent scoring patterns, clear differentiation between quality levels (high 8-9, medium 6-7, low 4-5), and proper ranking aggregation across multiple evaluation criteria.
context: This test open call validates the batch aggregation bug fix by ensuring photos are processed through the complete pipeline: batch processing → score aggregation → tier classification → report generation.
